attributes.action: Stop closing A&E departments in the name of "Progress"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many A&E departments in the country are under threat. Stop every single closure or amalgamation with another hospital. This isn't progress, its stripping people of a basic right to emergency care, every extra mile travelled will result in deaths.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
